Title: Logging and auditing support
Description: Support for querying and filtering audit logs through intuitive user interfaces (dashboards, reports, alerts).

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Dashboard : a centralized view of logs from multiple sources
Automated Alerting Rules: A list of "Red Flag" triggers (e.g., 5 failed logins in 1 minute, unauthorized data move) that notify the security team.
Privileged Action Log	A specific audit trail of everything "Admins" have done (e.g., changing permissions, accessing user folders).
